objects.specification: A light-colored, smooth floor surface resembling clean laminate, with subtle texture details that reflect ambient light softly to brighten the classroom environment.
A flat white ceiling with smooth finish matching the walls, designed to accommodate mounted fixtures such as lights and a projector while maintaining a clean minimalist appearance.
A compact ceiling-mounted projector with sleek light-gray housing, featuring a front-facing lens, ventilation grills on the sides, and minimalistic design.
A small square ceiling light fixture with a white diffused panel framed by a thin light-gray bezel, providing even ambient illumination.

A vertical wall painted in soft neutral white color, featuring a smooth matte finish suitable for mounting classroom elements.
A large rectangular matte black chalkboard with thin metallic frame, smooth writing surface for clear chalk visibility.

A classic round wall clock with white face, bold black numerals and hands, encased in slim black frame for clear time display.
